description: End unit in sought after cedar valley estates. These units were quality built in 2005 and are a lot wider than other townhomes on the market. The layout is very desirable. Hardwood throughout the main floor. Step right out to your private patio. 3 huge bedrooms and laundry up. 2-car wide garage with a workshop. Crawl space under the entire home. The development is gated and thereâ€™s a clubhouse and playground for kids. Close to schools, transit, parks and recreation. One dog or cat allowed.
